answers.answer: Oh yes. I'm almost 23 weeks and the dizziness started a week or so ago. Doctor said its very common at this stage. He's checking my blood levels to be safe but he says its usually due to the blood pressure or hormones. Told be to eat more often. Hope you start feeling better soon.
I'm 30 weeks and have been getting dizzy. My doctor is sending me for tests including for gestational diabetes.

question: Hey mommas...I have a question for you..so I'm 21+6 and I have been loving being in my second trimester.  But today was the first day I actually got a dizzy spell and had a sweat. I think its due to me standing since that's what my job requires. Have any of you guys experienced that?
title: dizziness...
